00041 
00042 class SsdpConnection;
00043 class RootService;
00044 class WanConnectionService;
00045 
00056 class IgdControlPoint : public QObject
00057 {
00058         Q_OBJECT
00059 
00060 public:  // public methods
00061 
00062         // The constructor
00063         IgdControlPoint(const QString &hostname, int port, const QString &rootUrl);
00064         // The destructor
00065         virtual             ~IgdControlPoint();
00066 
00067         // Return the external IP address
00068         QString              getExternalIpAddress() const;
00069         // Initialize the control point
00070         void                 initialize();
00071         // Return true if a controlable gateway is available
00072         bool                 isGatewayAvailable();
00073 
00074         // Add a port mapping
00075         void                 addPortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort, const QString &internalClient, int internalPort, const QString &description, bool enabled = true, int leaseDuration = 0);
00076         // Delete a port mapping
00077         void                 deletePortMapping(const QString &protocol, const QString &remoteHost, int externalPort);
00078 
00079 private slots:
00080         // The IGD was queried for it's services
00081         void                 slotDeviceQueried(bool error);
00082         // A WAN connection query was finished
00083         void                 slotWanQueryFinished(bool error);
00084 
00085 private:  // private attibutes
00086         // Is a gateway available?
00087         bool                 m_bGatewayAvailable;
00088         // The host of the gateway
00089         QString              m_szIgdHostname;
00090         // The port of the gateway
00091         int                  m_iIgdPort;
00092         // The root service
00093         RootService         *m_pRootService;
00094         // The wan connection service
00095         WanConnectionService *m_pWanConnectionService;
